mapper.insert: insert into city_board (subject, unum, cbcontent, cbwriteday, city1, city2, uname, cbphoto) value (#{subject}, #{unum}, #{cbcontent}, now(), #{city1}, #{city2}, #{uname}, #{cbphoto})
mapper.select: select subject from city_board where cbnum < #{cbnum} and city1 = #{city1} and city2 = #{city2} order by cbnum desc limit 1
